1356330.name: Liberated: For the Homeland
1356330.description:
“Great is truth, but still greater, from a practical point of view, is silence about truth.”
(Aldous Huxley, Brave New World)

Liberated: For The Homeland is the first of two short story addons for Liberated. In this story-driven epilogue, you’ll peek behind the curtains of an oppressive system operated by very ordinary people. It’s a story of the daily grind and crushing violence against individuality.

Media on Liberated:
"Looks like a noir graphic novel come to life" - Game Informer
"There’s really something magical here" - PC Invasion
"The story has echoes of Watchmen" - PC Gamer
“Blends noir comic art style with Inside-style-gameplay” - Polygon
“Feels like an episode of Black Mirror” - The Sartorial Geek



Liberated is an action-adventure game inside a living, hand-drawn comic book. Uncover an alarmingly current cyberpunk reality where human rights are dying away. Take up arms and solve puzzles in a noir rain-soaked city that’s desperate for justice.
Seamlessly merging the art of hand-drawn graphic novels with interactivity and side-scrolling action, it’s a revolutionary combination of video games and comics.
1356330.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 简体中文, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
